title: Can I get a refund
body: I sent a gift to a friend only to find out he didnt play that  champ but heres the kicker the gift never sent so could you send it through or give me my money back pls and thankyou

replies.body: I was able to double check what happened with that Arcade Ahri gift, and it did get sent successfully! It does look like they haven't used the skin yet, so I would suggest having you or your friend submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our billing team to get that looked into!
